importantDates.descriptionOfWhyDateIsRelevant: Kada Scott went missing on this date after leaving an overnight shift at an assisted living facility, marking the start of the investigation into her disappearance.
The remains of Kada Scott were discovered on this date behind an abandoned school in Philadelphia, confirming the identity through DNA testing and leading to arrests and further charges.
The stolen Hyundai Accent was reported on fire on this date, with video evidence showing it parked near the area where Scott’s body was later found.

importantTimeframes.descriptionOfWhyTimeFrameIsRelevant: The timeline of events begins on October 4, 2025, when Kada Scott went missing and the Hyundai was reported stolen and later found on fire, linking it to her disappearance.
Over the next 16 days, authorities conducted searches, received new tips, and ultimately discovered Scott’s remains, leading to arrests and further legal proceedings.

keyTakeAways: The remains of Kada Scott, a 23-year-old missing woman, were found behind an abandoned school in Philadelphia, confirmed by DNA testing after an anonymous tip led investigators back to the site.

Keon King, 21, of Dover, Delaware, has been arrested and charged with kidnapping, stalking, arson, causing or risking a catastrophe, conspiracy, and possibly homicide, following evidence of cellphone contact with Scott and video footage of the stolen Hyundai Accent used in the case.
The black Hyundai Accent, reported stolen on October 4, 2025, was seen parked at a recreation center near Scott’s last known location and later found on fire, with its body compacted at a junkyard.

Authorities believe King and Scott had ongoing contact via cellphones, and investigators have reason to believe others may have been involved in the incident after the fact, making the case still under active investigation.
Kada Scott, who worked in an assisted living facility, was remembered by her parents as a source of light and kindness; her family expressed deep grief and called for prayers.

namedEntities.name: Kada Scott
namedEntities.whatIsThisEntity: A 23-year-old woman who went missing in Philadelphia on October 4, 2025.
namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: The central figure in the case; her remains were found, and her disappearance prompted a major investigation into potential foul play and criminal activity.

namedEntities.name: Keon King
namedEntities.whatIsThisEntity: A 21-year-old man from Dover, Delaware, arrested and charged with kidnapping, stalking, arson, conspiracy, and possibly homicide.
namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: He is the primary suspect linked to Scott’s disappearance through cellphone contact, vehicle evidence, and prior criminal history, making him a critical figure in the investigation.

namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: Provides context for King’s background and geographic connection to the case, though he was arrested in Philadelphia.

namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: Found on fire near where Scott’s remains were discovered, with evidence suggesting it was used in or connected to her disappearance.

namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: He announced plans to bring homicide charges and emphasized legal process, showing the seriousness and ongoing nature of the investigation.

namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: She described key investigative developments, including the anonymous tip and video evidence, contributing to the case’s credibility and progression.

namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: The site where the remains were discovered, serving as a critical location in the investigation and recovery process.

namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: Provides context for Scott’s profession and daily routine, which helps establish the timeline of her disappearance.

summaryOfNewsArticle: The remains of 23-year-old Kada Scott, a woman who went missing in Philadelphia on October 4, 2025, were discovered behind an abandoned school after an anonymous tip prompted renewed investigation. DNA testing confirmed her identity. Keon King, a 21-year-old man from Dover, Delaware, has been arrested and charged with kidnapping, stalking, arson, conspiracy, and possibly homicide. Investigators found evidence linking King to Scott via cellphone contact and a stolen black Hyundai Accent, seen parked near the area where her body was found, which later burned at a junkyard. Prosecutors say more charges are being considered, and there is suspicion of additional individuals involved. The case remains under active investigation, with law enforcement emphasizing legal process and the possibility of future charges.
title: Remains Found Behind Abandoned School Belong to Missing Philadelphia Woman, Kada Scott
